forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun rises over Downtown San Francisco, a soft glow permeates the air, inviting residents to embrace a day filled with the serene clarity that characterizes this coastal haven. The forecast promises a pleasant day ahead, with temperatures dipping around 61 degrees in the early hours before gravitating to a cooler 59 by afternoon. Gentle winds from the west-southwest carry the fresh scent of the ocean, occasionally teasing with gusts that dance up to 21 mph, invigorating the atmosphere while keeping the chill at bay. 

Though the sun shines brightly, a subtle awareness of the marine layer remains, hinting at the city's complex relationship with fog. In the distance, the iconic Golden Gate Bridge stands proud, partly cloaked in fine mist, suggesting a transient veil that may linger but ultimately yield to sunshine as the hours unfold. As evening approaches and temperatures dip toward a comforting 50 degrees, the partly cloudy skies will create an inviting backdrop for leisurely strolls through neighborhoods brimming with artistic charm. Dress in layers to fully appreciate the interplay of warmth and coolness throughout the day; a light jacket will serve well, especially as the sun begins to set. With the rhythm of city life alive, consider taking a casual walk along the Embarcadero or discovering a local café—a perfect blend of enjoyment and tranquility allowed by the day’s weather.
